verses.verse: And these are the countries which the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> inherited <WH5157> <WH8804> in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, which Eleazar <WH499> the Kohen <WH3548>, and Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, and the heads <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1> of the tribes <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, distributed for inheritance <WH5157> <WH8765> to them.

By lot <WH1486> was their inheritance <WH5159>, as the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> by the hand <WH3027> of Mosheh <WH4872>, for the nine <WH8672> tribes <WH4294>, and for the half <WH2677> tribe <WH4294>.

For Mosheh <WH4872> had given <WH5414> <WH8804> the inheritance <WH5159> of two <WH8147> tribes <WH4294> and an half <WH2677> tribe <WH4294> on the other side <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383>: but unto the L'vi'im <WH3881> he gave <WH5414> <WH8804> none inheritance <WH5159> among <WH8432> them.

For the children <WH1121> of Yosef <WH3130> were two <WH8147> tribes <WH4294>, M'nasheh <WH4519> and Efrayim <WH669>: therefore they gave <WH5414> <WH8804> no part <WH2506> unto the L'vi'im <WH3881> in the land <WH776>, save cities <WH5892> to dwell <WH3427> <WH8800> in, with their suburbs <WH4054> for their cattle <WH4735> and for their substance <WH7075>.
As the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> Mosheh <WH4872>, so the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> did <WH6213> <WH8804>, and they divided <WH2505> <WH8799> the land <WH776>.

Then the children <WH1121> of Y'hudah <WH3063> came <WH5066> <WH8799> unto Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> in Gilgal <WH1537>: and Kalev <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Y'funeh <WH3312> the Kenezite <WH7074> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Thou knowest <WH3045> <WH8804> the thing <WH1697> that the YY <WH3068> said <WH1696> <WH8765> unto Mosheh <WH4872> the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430> concerning me <WH182> and thee <WH182> in Kadeshbarnea <WH6947>.

Forty <WH705> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> was I when Mosheh <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of the YY <WH3068> sent <WH7971> <WH8800> me from Kadeshbarnea <WH6947> to espy out <WH7270> <WH8763> the land <WH776>; and I brought <WH7725> him word <WH1697> again <WH7725> <WH8686> as it was in mine heart <WH3824>.

Nevertheless my brethren <WH251> that went up <WH5927> <WH8804> with me made the heart <WH3820> of the people <WH5971> melt <WH4529> <WH8689>: but I wholly <WH4390> <WH8765> followed <WH310> the YY <WH3068> my 'Elohim <WH430>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> sware <WH7650> <WH8735> on that day <WH3117>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Surely the land <WH776> whereon thy feet <WH7272> have trodden <WH1869> <WH8804> shall be thine inheritance <WH5159>, and thy children's <WH1121> for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>, because thou hast wholly <WH4390> <WH8765> followed <WH310> the YY <WH3068> my 'Elohim <WH430>.

And now, behold, the YY <WH3068> hath kept me alive <WH2421> <WH8689>, as he said <WH1696> <WH8765>, these forty <WH705> and five <WH2568> years <WH8141>, even since <WH227> the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8765> this word <WH1697> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, while the children of Yisra'EL <WH3478> wandered <WH1980> <WH8804> in the wilderness <WH4057>: and now, lo, I am this day <WH3117> fourscore <WH8084> and five <WH2568> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>.

As yet I am as strong <WH2389> this day <WH3117> as I was in the day <WH3117> that Mosheh <WH4872> sent <WH7971> <WH8800> me: as my strength <WH3581> was then, even so is my strength <WH3581> now, for war <WH4421>, both to go out <WH3318> <WH8800>, and to come in <WH935> <WH8800>.

Now therefore give <WH5414> <WH8798> me this mountain <WH2022>, whereof the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8765> in that day <WH3117>; for thou heardest <WH8085> <WH8804> in that day <WH3117> how the Anakims <WH6062> were there, and that the cities <WH5892> were great <WH1419> and fenced <WH1219> <WH8803>: if so be <WH194> the YY <WH3068> will be with <WH854> me, then I shall be able to drive them out <WH3423> <WH8689>, as the YY <WH3068> said <WH1696> <WH8765>.
And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> him, and gave <WH5414> <WH8799> unto Kalev <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Y'funeh <WH3312> Hevron <WH2275> for an inheritance <WH5159>.

Hevron <WH2275> therefore became the inheritance <WH5159> of Kalev <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Y'funeh <WH3312> the Kenezite <WH7074> unto this day <WH3117>, because that he wholly <WH4390> <WH8765> followed <WH310> the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And the name <WH8034> of Hevron <WH2275> before <WH6440> was Kiryat-Arba <WH7153>; which Arba was a great <WH1419> man <WH120> among the Anakims <WH6062>. And the land <WH776> had rest <WH8252> <WH8804> from war <WH4421>.
